raw_body: SUBASINGHE – Mrs. DIAS – Loving wife of late Mr. Norbert Dias Subasinghe,​ beloved mother of Channa,​ Mahendra,​ Kumari,​ Harsha & Vajira,​ mother-in-law of Pradeepa and Nadika,​ passed away at the age of 89 years. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on Tuesday,​ 7th May 2024 from 2:00 p.m. onwards. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour on 08th May 2024 at 5.00 p.m. for cremation at 5.30 p.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.          030186
